body:
i'm thankful that the rest of the week felt better than monday and tuesday. i'm thankful to express my feelings, which always seems to help me, what a novel concept!

i'm thankful that we had a hat making competition at work and people liked the hat i made out of antidepressant bottles rubber banded together.

i'm thankful that the weather has been so good lately, sun every day, it's so clear that spring is beckoning.

i'm thankful that though d and i had an argument, we worked through it productively.

i'm thankful that though miso usually won't sit in my lap, right now she is i think because she realizes that she can contort herself into angles for preening that are much harder by herself.

i'm thankful that though the pork chops sell by date wasn't until today, i quickly recognized that they were not good when i opened the package yesterday, and they were very clearly not good rather than being one of those leaners where you're like smelling it repeatedly and like it could go either way and you have to make the stressful judgement call. i'm thankful to not be worried about our access to food and i'm thankful we ordered our favorite pizza for dinner last night.

i'm thankful to have learned from [a coworker's newsletter](https://tinyletter.com/emchap/letters/emchap-s-shit-from-the-internet-03-18-20) about [spaghetts](https://www.bonappetit.com/story/wet-city-brewing-spaghett).

i'm thankful to feel a premonition that this is going to be a really good summer for music.

i'm thankful for season 1 episode 4 of _jersey shore_, a show which continues to charm me so much and especially this episode, which featured the adorable relationship of snooki and her mom and then all the roommates springing to snooki's defense with fierce loyalty. i'm thankful for how they all call her "snickers."

i'm thankful kh invited us over for happy hour yesterday evening and we brought our own drinks and sat at a safe distance in the slightly cold sunshine and talked with her and s for several hours.

i'm thankful that miso finally lost her last baby tooth.

i'm�thankful for [this person's mashups](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mnrfqPoX4WU&list=PL0B7qPkUvn7f_LABzeR-D6qkBfzqEAPO6), which are so, so good

i'm thankful that we had a hat making competition at work and people liked the hat i made out of antidepressant bottles rubber banded together.

i'm thankful kh invited us over for happy hour yesterday evening and we brought our own drinks and sat at a safe distance in the slightly cold sunshine and talked with her and s for several hours.
